answers.author: Evelina Moulder
answers.text:
Check with Pittsburgh. It appears that the city may contract for printing services.

author: Jeff Friedman
text:
Does anybody working in a large City or County government have experience with soliciting and then availing themselves of "managed print services" for their printing/copying needs?
If so, I would love to speak with you about it.
title: Managed Print Services
